typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_Id as integer,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Created_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputcustomer
source(output(
		D_KEY as integer,
		customer_Id as integer,
		DOB as date,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		last_updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dcustomer
source(output(
		D_KEY as integer,
		out_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(D_KEY) as D_KEY,\'1\' as out_key from D_customer',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> maxsurgarekey
source(output(
		Src_Tab as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select [Src_Tab],[Watermark_Value] from config',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> incremental
inputcustomer derive(DOB = toDate(DOB,'dd-MM-yyyy'),
		Created_Modified_Date = toTimestamp(Created_Modified_Date,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm'),
		input_tablename = 'D_customer') ~> datatypechange
updateflowProcess alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
incrementaldata, dcustomer exists(inputcustomer@customer_Id == dcustomer@customer_Id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> insertflow
SurrogateKey derive(out_D_KEY = D_KEY+surgate_key) ~> generatesurgatekey
insertflow derive(input_key = '1') ~> JoinDerivedColumn
JoinDerivedColumn, maxsurgarekey lookup(input_key == out_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupmaxkey
Lookupmaxkey keyGenerate(output(surgate_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
datatypechange, incremental join(input_tablename == Src_Tab,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joinincremental
Joinincremental filter(Created_Modified_Date > Watermark_Value) ~> incrementaldata
incrementaldata, dcustomer exists(inputcustomer@customer_Id == dcustomer@customer_Id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> updateflowProcess
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		D_KEY as integer,
		customer_Id as integer,
		DOB as date,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		last_updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['customer_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	postSQLs:['update config set [Watermark_Value]= (select max(last_updated_date) from D_customer) where [Src_Tab]=\'D_customer\''],
	mapColumn(
		customer_Id,
		DOB,
		Gender,
		city_code,
		Customer_Name,
		last_updated_date = Created_Modified_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> updatecustomer
generatesurgatekey sink(input(
		D_KEY as integer,
		customer_Id as integer,
		DOB as date,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		last_updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		customer_Id,
		DOB,
		Gender,
		city_code,
		Customer_Name,
		last_updated_date = Created_Modified_Date,
		D_KEY = out_D_KEY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> insertcustomer
